amendment.description: Amendment sought to require public housing authorities to establish local advisory boards with 60 percent of the membership comprised of tenants of public housing.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 5 in the Congressional Record of May 7, 1996, to require public housing authorities to establish local advisory boards, 60% of the membership of which to be comprised of tenants of public housing.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fields (LA) amendment (A012) Failed by voice vote.
